city_meta: Glasgow grew from a small rural settlement on the River Clyde
city_desc: Glasgow grew from a small rural settlement on the River Clyde to become the largest seaport in Britain.
region_meta: A Glasgow city is one of the eight electoral regions of the Scottish Parliament.
region_desc: A Glasgow is one of the eight electoral regions of the Scottish Parliament with total of 16 MSPs.
country_meta: The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, called the United Kingdom(UK).
country_desc: The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, called the United Kingdom(UK), is a sovereign state in Western Europe.
